package.name: Piwik_Ecommerce
package.summary: This is a GPL released Extension that allows you to get your Magento Ecommerce Transaction data in your Piwik install.
package.description:
Piwik is an amazing open source analytics program. Now with this extension you get the power of Magento and analytics to match. This Piwik Extension will give you the following right out of the box

Tracking of :
-impressions of products detail pages viewed
-impressions of categories viewed

Information from your Carts, including:
-Product in carts
-Items abandoned carts (lost revenue)

Information on Orders:
-All you would expect including revenue, subtotal, tax, shipping.
- Conversion rates by sku, category, and more

Version 1.0.8 Adds support for Piwik "No Search" results Version 1.0.9 Small bug fixes Version 1.1.0 Ads support for 404 tracking **You can use permissions to give any role access to the Piwik iframe***

After install, make sure you clear your cache. Click here for more details on how it works and how to install.
package.notes:
Piwik Search "No Search" results data in Piwik
Source code Available at: https://github.com/adriansonline/Piwik-for-Magento
